abstract: On Friday, religious leaders at St Paul's Cathedral, a 300-year church whose grounds the Occupy London Stock Exchange campaign had used as its headquarters, called on the protesters to decamp.
snippet: On Friday, religious leaders at St Paul's Cathedral, a 300-year church whose grounds the Occupy London Stock Exchange campaign had used as its headquarters, called on the protesters to decamp.
lead_paragraph: LONDON -- Less than a week after they set up camp in London's financial district, British anticapitalist protesters have been asked to leave.

headline.main: London Protesters Asked to Leave St. Paul's Cathedral
